TopicTitle: This is the place to Cry.

Articles.Content:
So, you recently lost many posts,rep or even your account.

So, Cry here.

Just.... post a crying face, or whatever you want.

I just lost 100 post an my rep.

I lost all 150 of my posts and all my rep.

I can handle it

Lost some, don't care how many.

Rep is for reddit

nothing wrong with reddit
I lost 350 posts

I lost 100ish.

Im over it though.

i lost 8 posts

I'm Back Baby!

i lost like 42 posts.................i think?

idk though glad that its fixed its fun to read through these forums
I had 3 or four rep all gone now
I lost 1,080 posts
does anybody remember that realistic looking tank that someone posted in the old rovers megathread before the crash? if so, could you pm that to me?
I lost over 500 posts, and does anyone know what step was after Bottle Rocketeer?
I think I only had 7 or 8 posts so I didn't lose much.
I had around 200, got bumped down, don't care. Rep? Didn't have much or any, really.

I don't know how many I lost. nor do I care.. Not really sure why everything has to be a 'competition'.. It's like people on facebook etc who just friend everyone so they can have a high number... What's the point?

How many posts you have, or what rep you have.. doesn't mean squat here. or most other places.. You'll actually be a lot better thought of here if you have 100 useful posts, instead 1000 pointless posts that do nothing but take up DB space and don't contribute anything to anyone.

We don't need a place to cry. Hell, Sal lost around 7000 posts and most likely a good deal of rep too. I lost about 1500 or so posts, as well as about 40 rep. So what? We keep on going. Now that the forums are back, we've got things we can do and so we do it
I have posted about 50 more than I have posted before the disaster, and I have 6 times the rep now than I had back then.
Do we really need another thread about the forum crash? Seriously, get over it.
i lost nothing lol
lost about 250 posts and all my rep. don't really care tho, I still love the forums. Mostly I come to stare in total awe at other people's creations, lol.
I lost a couple, but hey... we've got forums again!
Who care the old history? I lost my whole account but take it easy.

Don't know what I lost. I'd like to say I lost thousands of posts, but it's not true

The most annoying part was having to go through the moderation again for the first 10 posts, and that's already over now, so I no longer care.

I can lost all my posts, rep and whatever else on this forum and I will just doesn't care about... Why I should care anyway ? This is good question .

On forums like this one post counters, reputation and stuff like that just doesn't matter.

Only matters Your participation in discussion and trying to contribute something valuable to this community !

I hope You guys will remember about this.

Edited April 26, 2013 by karolus10

I care.

A lot of threads, such as my mods (because of migration to new computer during forum crash, (convieniant ) all mod data lost). Plus I had a stickyed, Newbie how-to thread that got lost.

I also belive I lost the most posts (aside from moderators), 3 thousand posts.
